titles.title: Recognizing the University of Southern Mississippi for 100 years of service and excellence in higher education.
Recognizing the University of Southern Mississippi for 100 years of service and excellence in higher education.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Recognizes the University of Southern Mississippi, in Hattiesburg, Mississippi, for 100 years of service and excellence in higher education.
Congratulates the school on the occasion of its 100th anniversary.
